member.name: IAppxFactory2.CreateContentGroupMapReader
member.param: The stream that delivers the content group map XML for reading.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxFactory2.CreateContentGroupMapWriter
member.param: The stream that receives the content group map.
Provides a write-only object model for a content group map.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxFactory2.CreateSourceContentGroupMapReader
member.param: The stream that delivers the source content group map XML for reading.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxFactory2
member.summary: Creates objects for reading and writing app packages.
